name: frontend-workers
description: Frontend and Camunda workers unified project
author: Stiven / Camunda Services GmbH

scripts.build: tailwindcss -i styles.css -o build/main.css && npm run copy
scripts.watch: concurrently "tailwindcss -i styles.css -o build/main.css --watch" "nodemon --watch build/main.css --exec npm run copy"
